full_threads.body:
Perfect Heath. Can we please have the top font altered to below: Group bookings are ideal for those that don't require a private space and want something more casual. You will receive a reserved table in our Charcoal Joes area which is next to our kids playground. We take bookings from 8 to 40 guests and they are available between Tuesday through to Sunday from 11:00am onwards. All group bookings are for two hours duration and require full payment at time of booking to secure your date. There are two set menus to choose from for food for the adults and a children's menu available, all beverages can be purchased at the bar on the day. Complete the booking form here to secure your space. 2nd box underneath dot points, just a few to be fixed or added:
  • Available between Tuesday through to Sunday from 11:00am onwards
  • Children meals are available for up to 12 years of age
  • To confirm your booking full payment is required
I will send through some photos for you shortly via drop box for the page, as they are too large to send via email. CHLOE SENIOR SALES EVENT MANAGER 20 SHEPHERD STREET,LIVERPOOL NSW 2170 T. +61 2 8742 4033 W. WWW.THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM E. CHLOE@THEPAPERMILLFOOD.COM Coronation notice and disclaimer: the information contained in this email (including attachments) is confidential and privileged. Cool, we have created the new page and added it to the header menu. Let me know what you think? 
https://thepapermillfood.com/group-bookings/

Yeah perfect!

What do you think?

We can then add some photos and make it its own identity?

Looking forward to your reply,

CHLOE

Hope you are well.

For the events enquiry form can we please remove the option for them to pick casual group booking.

As people are getting confused with events and our group booking options.

Can the drop down options be:

Private Event
Wedding
Corporate Event

Can we also add a new drop box questions: What is your preferred space? 1. Event Rooms 2. Private Dining Room

Thank you so much in advance!

CHLOE
